content: विजृंभित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Gaped, yawned; <ls>Mk. 5. 51.</ls> {@--2@} Opened, blown, expanded. {@--3@} Displayed, exhibited, manifested; <ls>R. 7. 42</ls>; <ls>U. 6. 2.</ls> {@--4@} Appeared. {@--5@} Sported. --तं {@--1@} Sport, pastime. {@--2@} Wish, desire. {@--3@} Display, exhibition; अज्ञानविजृंभितमेतत्. {@--4@} An act, action, conduct; <ls>Māl. 10. 21.</ls> {@--5@} Fruit, result.
